title: Can increase production with no OC when inside PPC

content.question: When an economy operates inside its production possibilities curve, it can increase production of one good

choices.label: at zero opportunity cost in terms of the other good
only with an increase in unemployment
only with an increase in the price level
only with an increase in technology
only if the labor force increases

content.answer: at zero opportunity cost in terms of the other good

topic.text: 1.2: Opportunity Cost and the Production Possibilities Curve (PPC)
